info.description: Create, modify, delete, retrieve, search and historical engagement search.
info.title: Engagement

post.description:
Retrieve draft engagements that match a specified set of engagement attribute criteria.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::rpc-name=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because SearchDraftEngagements API will provide the draft engagments. --)

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

typesDataValue.title: A data value of one of the following type

v1Engagement.description: Engagement object is used in engagement API server for persisting engagement data.

id.description: ID describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier. The engagement id.

entity.title:
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because on other places entityId is string but we have common entity type for investment_research domain. --)
The entity (e.g. Cusip, Equity, etc.) are associated with this engagement

selectedPermissionGroups.title: The selected permission groups. (-- aip.dev/beta-blocker: refactor to use permission common resource when it's ready --)

state.description:
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we have engagement specific states which could be regular, draft, resctricted unspeciifed or illegal. --)
The engagement note state.

customFields.title: This will contain custom fields which will have the name and its value which could be number, List, string or map

permissionGroup.title:
permission group
(-- aip.dev/beta-blocker: refactor to use permission common resource when it's ready --)

v1ExpiringPermissionTimeUnit.description:
- EXPIRING_PERMISSION_TIME_UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified
 - EXPIRING_PERMISSION_TIME_UNIT_DAYS: Days
 - EXPIRING_PERMISSION_TIME_UNIT_WEEKS: Weeks
 - EXPIRING_PERMISSION_TIME_UNIT_MONTHS: Months
 - EXPIRING_PERMISSION_TIME_UNIT_FOREVER: Forever
v1ExpiringPermissionTimeUnit.title: Expiring Permission Time Unit enums

v1SearchDraftEngagementsRequest.title:
The request message for EngagementAPI.SearchDraftEngagementsRequest.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::request-message-search-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because here search string is entityId and all the filter will are provided using filter_criteria --)
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::request-message-name=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because SearchDraftEngagementsRequest make more sense. --)

entityIds.title:
entity ids: cusips, issuer ids, etc.
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because entity ids will refine the search. --)
(-- api-linter: aladdin::0901::dictionary-message-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we are using common Entity type. --)

filterCriteria.title:
Filter criteria
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because user can pass multiple criterias to filter results. --)

orderBy.title:
Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc. e.g. "engagement.publish_time desc, engagement.author"
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we need to sort the results. --)

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of engagement to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 10
note will be returned.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'SearchEngagement' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'SearchEngagement' must match the call that provided the page
token.

v1SearchDraftEngagementsResponse.title:
The response message for EngagementAPI.SearchDraftEngagementsResponse.
(-- api-linter: core::0158::response-next-page-token-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this  because we are using solr and solr don't have support for this. --)
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::response-message-name=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because SearchDraftEngagementsResponse make more sense. --)

v1SearchEngagementsRequest.title:
The request message for EngagementAPI.SearchEngagements.
(-- api-linter: aladdin::9016::request-message-search-field=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because here search string is as_of_date and all the filter will are provided using filter_criteria --)

asOfDate.title:
The as_of_Date will have the date for which records need to be extracted
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because as_of_date is the default criteria we need to filter down engagements. --)

entity ids: cusips, issuer ids, etc.
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because entity ids will refine the search. --)

 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we are using common Entity type. --)

filterCriteria.title:
Filter criteria
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because user can pass multiple criterias to filter results. --)

orderBy.title:
Sorts the response with ascending or descending order based on specific field. Default as asc. e.g. "engagement.publish_time desc, engagement.author"
(-- api-linter: core::0132::request-unknown-fields=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because we need to sort the results. --)

v1State.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: The engagement has not been specified
 - STATE_DRAFT: The engagement is a draft
 - STATE_PUBLISH: The engagement is a publish
 - STATE_INVALID: The engagement is auto deleted and marked as invalid
that deleted from Aladdin Research team either from index program or bulk load failure
v1State.title: Engagement specifies the type of engagement state (regular, draft, deleted)

timeFrame.title: Timeframe the values are like "ST (<1 yr)"

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
